transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hello. Hi, sorry I didn't get to call previously. Is there anything that I can do for you? Yeah, so actually this follow up regarding the student accommodation. That's the only reason I gave you the call. Sorry, this call was regarding your student accommodation? Yeah, yeah. Accommodations. Yes. Have you decided anything with the options regarding your student accommodation? Yes, I think so. I applied for extensions for the my current accommodations at Princos. Could you help me on that? Can you please repeat that? Once again, I wasn't able to hear that. Sorry, my phone call is not very clear. Pardon? Are you available on WhatsApp by this number? Yeah, I think I'm available for after the September. Yeah. What I'm trying to confirm here is do you have WhatsApp number available with this? You mean water available? Sorry, no, no. Are you available on WhatsApp so that we can have the communication over there? Yeah, yeah, I'm available on the WhatsApp. But is it different? I have a different phone number on that. I can give you a second later, I need to check on that. Are you a UCL accommodation staff or like from the platform? Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes. No, no. We are the official accommodation partner for UCL only. I see. I can give you my WhatsApp number. It's not this phone number, but it's a different phone number. I can give you that. Tell me, what is it? My WhatsApp number? Yes, it's 78807-88-8086. My 869742. Yeah, just a moment. Can you find it? Yes, I have just dropped your WhatsApp text. Can you please confirm? Yeah, I received it. Thank you. I'll be connecting with you on the WhatsApp. Yeah, you can leave the message through the WhatsApp then. Because my phone call is not very clear. Probably because of the microphone or something. We can just communicate through the WhatsApp. Not initially. It's okay. Okay. Okay, thank you. Welcome back.

Speaker A: Hi.
Speaker B: Yeah, hello.
Speaker A: Hi. Can you hear me?
Speaker B: Yeah, I can hear you. Am I audible now?
Speaker A: Sorry?
Speaker B: Am I audible to you.
Speaker A: Oliver?
Speaker B: No, no, I'm just conforming. Am I audible to you? Like, are you able to hear me out.
Speaker A: May? All right. I. I think.
Speaker B: So, actually. This call is regarding your student accommodation for ucl.
Speaker A: Yup, yup, yup, yup.
Speaker B: Just wanted to confirm if you have decided with the property now.
Speaker A: I haven't decided.
Speaker B: I can see this number isn't available on WhatsApp. So may I know like, which number is available on WhatsApp so that I can share you some options?
Speaker A: Okay, I will let you know.
Speaker B: So, like, what is your WhatsApp number? Because this seems that this number is not available on WhatsApp.
Speaker A: I think I already give you the WhatsApp number. Right.
Speaker B: Can you please re. Give it if that's okay with you.
Speaker A: Are you. Are you from the UCL accommodation?
Speaker B: Yes, yes, I am. Yes, I am.
Speaker A: If you mean my WhatsApp number. A second, I thought I already gave you, but it's probably from other. Other people. Second, my WhatsApp number is a different one. I'm not using this WhatsApp.
Speaker B: I have been trying to mail you daily. You. You gave me a response that you have shortlisted some property, but you want to have a short stay, correct?
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah, yeah. You mean the short term?
Speaker B: The short term is at least for three months, to be honest.
Speaker A: Oh, oh, so you. You already have my WhatsApp number.
Speaker B: Can you please give it to me yet?
Speaker A: Yeah, I told her I already give you my WhatsApp number already.
Speaker B: We don't have it. Can you please give it again?
Speaker A: Okay, my WhatsApp number is 0,788. 078-8086. Yeah.
Speaker B: So just repeating it out. 778-808-69742. Is it? Yeah, yeah, but it's 11 digit number. Can you please repeat that once again?
Speaker A: 078-808-69742.
Speaker B: Okay, so I'll be reaching out to you on the screen. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay. You can also with me through the email if you have.
Speaker B: Sure, I will share it to you. I will share with you options which are available for a shorter duration.
Speaker A: Okay, I will. I will check that all later. I'm a little bit in the middle.
Speaker B: Sure.
Speaker A: Yeah.
Speaker B: Oh, goodbye.
